trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.

In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別提供下列功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>類別設計工具，在繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>屬性傳回的格式化配置中顯示的資料集合**自動格式化** 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the top level <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> templates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>屬性會傳回欄位相關聯的範本群組集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項和最上層<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>範本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項以產生設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別方法會提供下列功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法繫結相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項設計階段資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法會傳回用來呈現關聯的標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備設計工具，以檢視、 編輯和設計關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnClick%2A>呼叫方法時，相關聯的設計階段檢視區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按下。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>方法時，會呼叫相關聯的資料來源的結構描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove or add additional properties or to shadow properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法用來移除或加入其他屬性，或是遮蔽屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>。

trans-unit.source: Design-time editable regions are not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> methods have no functionality.
trans-unit.target: 中不支援設計階段的可編輯區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，所以<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法沒有任何功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyDetailsView` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例衍生`MyDetailsView`控制項從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>。

trans-unit.source: The `MyDetailsView` is simply a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: `MyDetailsView`是只是一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyDetailsViewDesigner` class from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> and places a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> object for `MyDetailsViewDesigner` on the `MyDetailsView` control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也衍生`MyDetailsViewDesigner`類別從<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>，並將<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>物件`MyDetailsViewDesigner`上`MyDetailsView`控制項。

trans-unit.source: `The MyDetailsViewDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> property to specify that the pager row of the design-time view of the `MyDetailsView` contain five page links.
trans-unit.target: `The MyDetailsViewDesigner` 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>屬性以指定的設計階段檢視的頁面巡覽區列`MyDetailsView`包含五個的頁面連結。

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the **Property** grid at design time.
trans-unit.target: 它會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法以進行<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyDetailsView` grid at design time.
trans-unit.target: 它會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，將包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性，如果它已指定，為新的第一個資料列中`MyDetailsView`在設計階段的方格。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the `MyDetailsView` is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>屬性`MyDetailsView`是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None>值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色虛線外的框。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner" /> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別時，它會建立相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個設計工具相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> that contains the predefined schemes for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 的預先定義配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>的內部類別的 XML 編碼成員中會填入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control to bind to the design-time data source.
Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to the design-time data source and calculates the number of pager and automatically generated rows that are required, based on features that are specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法繫結相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項設計階段資料來源，然後計算的呼叫器和自動產生的資料列所需，依據所指定的功能數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>。

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: `dataBoundControl`參數代表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control at design time.
Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> at design time.

First, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to `true`, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 首先，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制權傳輸至`true`，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合是空的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> control to an empty <xref:System.String> array if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>然後設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>控制項空<xref:System.String>陣列，如果無法取得資料來源的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: It refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to be called.
trans-unit.target: 它會重新整理<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>物件來強制<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>来呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會呼叫基底方法，產生標記。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a class inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>類別中的方法繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別，以變更的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> is defined.
trans-unit.target: 範例會將新的第一個資料列加入至方格，將包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>定義。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the control that is derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>衍生自控制項的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None>值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色虛線外的框。

trans-unit.source: It does not change the run-time appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 它不會變更控制項的執行階段外觀。

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" />方法，請務必呼叫基底方法，因為它最後透過數個覆寫層級，會呼叫上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> to which to add definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control.
Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> at design time.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以產生設計階段呈現標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method also populates `regions` with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法也會填入`regions`與<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>每個可點選或可選取區域的設計階段呈現的物件。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，每個資料列中的第一個儲存格為可選取; 資料列中的所有資料格都是可點按。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>繼承自一個類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別，以變更的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> is defined.
trans-unit.target: 範例會將新的第一個資料列加入至方格，將包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>定義。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>衍生自控制項的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None>值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色虛線外的框。

trans-unit.source: It does not change the run-time appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 它不會變更控制項的執行階段外觀。

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> method, be sure to call the base method or the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> overload because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" />方法，確定呼叫基底方法或<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" />多載，因為它們最後幾個覆寫層級，透過呼叫上<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> for which to fetch content.
Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
The content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
This functionality is not currently available.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能目前不提供。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />, control which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備好要用來呈現的設計工具時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>和其基底的方法設定屬性和設定事件所需的設計工具的作業。

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: `component`參數代表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>與這個設計工具或一份該控制項相關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> that defines the clicked region of the control.
Called when a region of the design-time view for the associated control is clicked.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnClick%2A>方法儲存所選資料區域的索引，並更新呈現標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>設計介面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: 除非在設計工具處於樣板編輯模式或欄位為已加入或編輯，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法中，依序呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>方法，以更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>以反映資料來源變更的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added and shadowed properties.
Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the <paramref name="Properties" /> grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

Control designers use methods derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the `Properties` grid.
trans-unit.target: 控制設計工具使用衍生自方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性`Properties`方格。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> property to `false` when the control is in template mode.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>屬性`false`於範本模式下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the `Fields` dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保無法使用來刪除於範本模式下的資料行`Fields` 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class to change the `Properties` grid of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>繼承自一個類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別，以變更`Properties`方格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The example makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the `Properties` grid.
trans-unit.target: 此範例可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>屬性顯示在`Properties`方格。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows to show.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的範例資料列數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> property always returns the number `2`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>屬性一律會傳回數字`2`。

trans-unit.source: This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致顯示的頁面巡覽區列中的兩個頁面連結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> property in a class inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A>類別中的屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>類別若要變更的頁面巡覽區列中顯示的頁面連結數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The example causes five page links to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會顯示五個頁面連結。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> to update.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> to write to <c>region</c>.
Specifies content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法沒有任何功能，則不支援在設計階段檢視的可編輯區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> containing an element for each templated field in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中每個範本欄位的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property constructs a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control field (such as header, footer, and pager) in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>屬性建構的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>物件，一個用於每個樣板化的資料欄位，每個控制項中的欄位 （例如頁首、 頁尾和頁面巡覽區） 相關聯的其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data field <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements have a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object for each of the predefined row template types.
trans-unit.target: 資料欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>元素具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>的每個預先定義的資料列範本類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: The control field <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements contain a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 控制欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>元素包含單一<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy, rather than the actual control associated with the designer, to generate the design-time markup.
Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性一律會是`true`，設計工具會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>包含一份相關聯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項以產生設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項不會影響任何持續性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control itself to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性覆寫以傳回`false`，設計師會使用相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制其本身，以產生設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" />屬性，以傳回<see langword="false" />或要判定其是否標示控制項類別層級為基礎的值<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />物件。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> is not overridden, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> object ignores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" />未覆寫，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />物件會忽略<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />。
